name: Wastelanders Soyjak
description: You've just woke up. It's an unfamiliar sight, you proceed to look at the bed sheet and you saw Harry Potter on it. "Wait" you've exclaimed, you remembered your blanket isn't Harry Potter theme and your pillows isn't the flag of the rising sun flag. You check the wall to see anime, soylent bottles and disney and Marvel stuff. This room isn't familiar, it's time to get out of here. It's DO or get consoomed by Soyjak.
